movie.title: The Libertine
movie.plot: The story of John Wilmot, a.k.a. the Earl of Rochester, a 17th century poet who famously drank and debauched his way to an early grave, only to earn posthumous critical acclaim for his life's work.

events.title: John Wilmot, the Second Earl of Rochester, dies
